remarks: Write out the epimorphism property directly.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isepi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isepi.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
isepi.o $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
isepi.e $e |- E = ( Epi ` C ) $.
isepi.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
isepi.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
isepi.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
isepi2 $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X E Y ) <-> ( F e. ( X H Y ) /\ A. z e. B A. g e. ( Y H z ) A. h e. ( Y H z ) ( ( g ( <. X , Y >. .x. z ) F ) = ( h ( <. X , Y >. .x. z ) F ) -> g = h ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. g h z $.
$d B g z $.
$d C g z $.
$d F g h z $.
$d H g h z $.
$d X g h z $.
$d Y g h z $.
$d g ph z $.
